rows.label: tev000801_MSG0003
rows.name:
What? Nothing! What do you want from me, anyway?
Get to business or get the hell outta here![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000801_MSG1001
rows.name:
Heya, pard! You got a job in the works?
If so, bring me along![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000801_MSG1002
rows.name:
Damn straight! With the two of us together,
there ain't nothing out there we can't handle.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000801_MSG1003
rows.name:
Aw, you're killin' me here! You gotta let me prove how
unbeatable we could be together![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000801_MSG1008
rows.name:
You got that job straight from Vandham, huh?
Those BLADEs down there must be real deep in the
weeds if the big man is barkin'.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000801_MSG1009
rows.name:
But I'm sure it's nothing you and I can't handle.
So come on, pard! Take me off the bench![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000801_MSG1011
rows.name:
Aw, you're killin' me here! You gotta let me prove how
unbeatable we could be together![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000801_MSG1016
rows.name:
It sounds like a whole bunch of White Whale debris
landed in Oblivia.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000801_MSG1017
rows.name:
We should try to recover it while you're on your
mission, and that means you should take me along!
What do you say, pard? Ready to kick some ass?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000801_MSG1019
rows.name:
Aw, you're killin' me here! You gotta let me prove how
unbeatable we could be together![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000801_MSG1024
rows.name:
You've already had your team assigned for this
mission? Damn it to hell![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000801_MSG1025
rows.name:
Well then, crank that job out and hurry back.
I wanna go recover more White Whale pieces together.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000801_MSG1030
rows.name:
So a little bird told me that Irina's team has been
surrounded by the Ganglion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000801_MSG1031
rows.name:
I know this ain't a Reclaimers' gig, but I'd like to
help save your friends before it turns into one.
Be nice to bring BLADEs back alive for once, yeah?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000801_MSG1033
rows.name:
Aw, you're killin' me here! You gotta let me prove how
unbeatable we could be together![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000801_MSG1038
rows.name:
I hear the Ganglion have some major bases
in Sylvalum.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000801_MSG1039
rows.name:
Not that it'd even slow down the superteam that is
you and me! Ha! So what's the verdict, pard?
We gonna mop up these Ganglion bastards or what?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000801_MSG1041
rows.name:
Aw, you're killin' me here! You gotta let me prove how
unbeatable we could be together![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000801_MSG1046
rows.name: All that searchin', and still no sign of the Lifehold Core.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000801_MSG1047
rows.name:
Maybe it'll finally turn up on our next job, yeah?
Just like, bam! Out of nowhere! So what do you think?
Wanna bring me along for luck?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000801_MSG1049
rows.name:
Aw, you're killin' me here! You gotta let me prove how
unbeatable we could be together![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000801_MSG1054
rows.name:
Finally, an assault on the Ganglion HQ!
Man, I've dreamed of this day...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000801_MSG1055
rows.name:
Open wide, Ganglion! You're about to have the full
potential of mankind rammed down your goddamn
throat, and Yelv's gonna be the chef![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000801_MSG1057
rows.name:
Aw, you're killin' me here! You gotta let me prove how
unbeatable we could be together![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000801_MSG1062
rows.name:
The damn Lifehold Core won't keep runnin' for much
longer.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000801_MSG1063
rows.name: We gotta get down there and secure it...for him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000801_MSG1064
rows.name:
And also for every other BLADE that we lost to a
Ganglion attack! So come on! Lemme deal out some
hot, creamy justice on this one![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000801_MSG1065
rows.name:
This could be our last job ever, so we gotta do it
together. You hear me, right, pard?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000801_MSG1066
rows.name:
Aw, you're breakin' my heart. If this ain't the time to
get the superteam back together, when the hell is?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000801_MSG1071
rows.name:
No way we're letting those bastards make fools out of
humanity and get away with it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000801_MSG1072
rows.name:
Once we're done with them, everyone on Mira will
sing the legends of our goddamn superteam![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000801_MSG1073
rows.name:
There you go, pard! Ain't nowhere we can't go if we
just stick together.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000801_MSG1074
rows.name:
Aw, you're killin' me here! You gotta let me prove how
unbeatable we could be together![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000801_MSG2001
rows.name: So if they found his left arm in Oblivia...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000801_MSG2002
rows.name:
That means he must have fallen somewhere around
that area, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000801_MSG2003
rows.name:
At the very least, we might find something that leads us
to where he landed. So whaddya say, pard?
Will you help me search the area?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000801_MSG2004
rows.name:
Thanks, pard. I know we can find him if we just
work together.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000801_MSG2005
rows.name:
Huh. Well, all right then. Guess I'll just head out and
search by my own goddamn self![ST:wait ]
